p: We recently described an age-dependent ferret model for SFTS disease where infected animals demonstrated reduced white blood cell counts, severe thrombocytopenia, high fever and a high mortality rate ( 40). We used this model to assess the virulence of recently described recombinant SFTS viruses (rHB2912aaNSs and rHB29NSsP 102A) and assessed their suitability as live-attenuated vaccine candidates ( 31, 33).
